text:
[Verse]
Sunrise calls my name
Dreams in golden rays
Morning light it stays
In my heart it plays

[Verse 2]
Running through the park
Feel the rhythm spark
Laughter 'til it's dark
Echoes through the lark

[Chorus]
Golden days they shine
Every moment mine
Love in every line
Life's a sweet design

[Verse 3]
Dancing in the rain
Joy without a chain
Happiness is plain
In this simple lane

[Bridge]
Stars are out tonight
Shining oh so bright
Guiding with their light
Through the darkest night

[Verse 4]
Whispers in the breeze
Magic in the trees
Finding all the keys
To our memories
title: Golden Days
